intro: Take each letter to its mailbox
description:
The mail has been scattered! Take on the mail route from hell, recover and deliver mail to its rightful place! Mayhem Mail is a classic single screen arcade platformer with some added puzzle elements.

Deliver the mail through its 60 colorful 2D levels full with dangers and enemies.

Everything in a day’s worth of work!


Features
* Precision platforming gameplay with some puzzles mixed in
* Deliver mail through 6 themed worlds with different mechanics
* Classic 8-bit graphics and chiptune soundtrack for an authentic retro experience
* Assist Mode for added accessibility
